summary: Ahsoka the Vampire Slayer - Redrikki - Star Wars: The Clone Wars (2008) - All Media Types [Archive of Our Own]
title: Ahsoka the Vampire Slayer - Redrikki - Star Wars: The Clone Wars (2008) - All Media Types [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/1
Fandom: Star Wars: The Clone Wars (2008) - All Media Types, Star Wars - All Media Types
Rating: General Audiences
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Anakin Skywalker & Ahsoka Tano, Barriss Offee & Ahsoka Tano, Barriss Offee & Luminara Unduli
Characters: Ahsoka Tano, Anakin Skywalker, Barriss Offee, Luminara Unduli
Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Buffy The Vampire Slayer Fusion, Canon Disabled Character
Summary:

Ahsoka is the Chosen One, the Slayer. The one girl in all the world with the power to fight the forces of darkness, or at least she was until she died. She got better, but now there’s a new Slayer in town and things with her Watcher are strained at best. Add in a bunch of zombie mind control bugs and Ahsoka’s week could be going better.

blog.name: awritinghaggis
blog.title: Tastyhaggis' Emporium of Words
blog.description:
The lewd and not so lewd writings of a Scottish deviant. A fan of sci-fi, dystopian and fantasy settings as well as someone who likes to scribble the first crap that enters his brain.

New to lewd writing but he's giving it a shot. Violence is also fun because what's a story without a little action, eh? Sex-related stories will be marked NSFW in title. 

For a note; some of the stories that are lewd may have shall we say 'less than wholesome' content. Reason is so that if someone wants to request a story of that nature I have examples on standby. Turns out boys and girls love to write, and read, this stuff and it's very popular. This content will have GAME OVER tags to represent the genre. If it upsets you after this warning then well, not much I can do.

title: OC Profile: Garmas Talesa (SW/Sci-Fi)
body:
Name: Garmas Talesa

Age: 50

Gender: Male

Orientation: Bisexual

Marital Status: Widowed

Birthplace: Concord Dawn, Mandalore Sector

Species: ½ Human, ½  Zeltron

Physical Appearance and Traits

One of the first things those who meet Garmas for the first time note is, perhaps, his height. The Mandalorian stands at a looming seven feet and his broad, muscled frame typically encased in armour tends to give him quite the imposing figure. With dark skin, grey hair luminous green eyes Garmas is a man that time has not been kind to. His face is covered with large, gashing scars that give him a more haggard appearance especially with the wrinkles that show on the corners of his mouth and face.

His body still possesses the steely muscles of his youth given his active lifestyle and his body’s burden of wielding his heavy armour. Made from Mandalorian Iron his plates are painted blank and fixed over a skintight bodyweave. Pelt and clan sigils adorn his armour as both decoration and his status within his warband.

Garmas’ skin also secrets Zeltron pheromones though he is not able to use these to influence thoughts or emotions they do enhance his attractiveness to those who kiss or lick his skin. However to spare any awkward moments he frequently injects a suppressant to prevent such occurrences.

Personality

Garmas is the type of man to lament his advanced age in a culture where most die young. While a sign of his skill at arms and refusal to die it has also worn him down like a stone subjected to wind and water. He carries the loss of a wife and comrades from four decades of warfare across five major galactic conflicts. The warlord tries his best to take this in his stride and move forward with his life.

He is a man with nothing to prove and as such he is typically genial to those he doesn’t know; typically sparing his wrath for genuine threats. Garmas is equally happy to give advice to the young as well as reminisce with the old. As a Mandalorian, loyalty is extremely important to him and a friend will always find a willing hand or gun in the tall warlord.

Having grown tired with leadership he hopes to hand the reins over to a successor; his son preferably though he knows that would be up for whoever triumphs at the Trials of Succession. Garmas wishes to seek adventure and battle having missed the chance to do so; stuck with the obligation through Mand’alor to fight the Empire’s battles.

As a lover Garmas is unbridled passion, a caring and undiluted adoration. While he knows nothing can replace the loss of his wife he simply seeks to enjoy his last decades in happiness.


———————–


My oldest boy. No longer my main per se but he’s my favourite character. I’ve always liked the grizzled warrior types with a lot of history and more to them than scars. 


The art is done by @rina-monster ! Check her out! Give her love and monies and in exchange you will have wonderful stuff!

title: Slash to Impress
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2qgnggP

by Lady_Faulkner

Brendol Hux is dead and Ben decides to cancel his weekend away with Rey to support Armitage. Rey isn’t thrilled about this since they had been planning to have sex for the first time. Phasma and Poe tag along and a night of horror begins.

Words: 5545, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 11 of Huxloween Prompts 2018

  • Fandoms: Star Wars Sequel Trilogy
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death, Underage
  • Categories: F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Ben Solo, Rey (Star Wars), Poe Dameron, Phasma (Star Wars), Armitage Hux, Brendol Hux
  • Relationships: Rey/Ben Solo, Poe Dameron/Rey, Armitage Hux/Ben Solo

summary: Tumblr: Star Wars fans are the worst, the way they harangued George Lucas when he was just trying to entertain them. What...
body:
Tumblr: Star Wars fans are the worst, the way they harangued George Lucas when he was just trying to entertain them. What ungrateful bastards to not appreciate the man who brought them so much joy!

Also Tumblr: That bitch J.K. Rowling didn’t make Dumbledore gay enough!

summary: Star Wars: Episode IX leak involving Kylo Ren and Darth Vader should be made
body:
Star Wars: Episode IX leak involving Kylo Ren and Darth Vader should be made

The leak claims that Kylo Ren will have a nightmare where he will see the moment Darth Vader is masked for the first time.

I think this would link up with the prequel Trilogy really well, especially as Ben seems to see visions of the past and he will do so through a nightmare, as Anakin saw the future in nightmares. It would be an amazing scene I think, but it all depends on how long the time frame is between TLJ and EPIX. If it’s like 7 years since TLJ and Kylo is having nightmares about turning to the Dark Side, it would be safe to say his situation he’s still confused. Or perhaps he’s being tempted to return to the Dark Side and the vision is sent to him to help him?

summary: Tarkin's Revenge was a squadron of at least three TIE/fo space superiority fighters named after Grand Moff Tarkin. The squadron...
body:
Tarkin’s Revenge was a squadron of at least three TIE/fo space superiority fighters named after Grand Moff Tarkin. The squadron served in the navy of the First Order and were involved with the Starkiller aerial defence force. They were also part of the forces scrambled to defend Starkiller Base in the Resistance Attack. During it the fighters of Tarkin’s Revenge fought against the Resistance Commander Poe Dameron in his X-wing starfighter Black One and ultimately lost the battle. Starkiller Base was destroyed.

Tarkin somewhere in the cosmos:

title: Slash to Impress
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2qgnggP

by Lady_Faulkner

Brendol Hux is dead and Ben decides to cancel his weekend away with Rey to support Armitage. Rey isn’t thrilled about this since they had been planning to have sex for the first time. Phasma and Poe tag along and a night of horror begins.

Words: 5545, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

summary: We Need to Talk about Vader
title: We Need to Talk about Vader
body:
Why do we love Vader so much? Why do we love Maul? Or Boba Fett? What’s common between Star Wars geek icons? Just some thoughts on what they are and why it happens that these are so beloved.

Keep Reading
